com.metrics.common.models

Interface IDialogSupportProvider


  • public interface IDialogSupportProvider

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void alert(String msg)
      Displays message in a model dialog box (with OK only, so message should be purely informative).
      void connectToServer()
      Present user with server connection dialog.
      void connectToServer(com.metrics.common.servers.ManagedSolrServer server, boolean editServer)
      Connect to a known server.
      void disconnectFromServers(ArrayList<com.metrics.common.servers.ManagedSolrServer> servers, boolean remove)
      Disconnect from servers.
      boolean requestBooleanSetting(String key)
      A Model can request that its caller solicit input from a user.
      void requestConfirmation(String msg)
      Displays message in an OK/CANCEL modal dialog box; if user selects CANCEL, throws ScriptCanceledException (otherwise does nothing).
      int requestDateSetting(String key)
      A Model can request that its caller solicit input from a user; parses common date inputs; returns valid date in integer form YYYYMMDD.
      int requestDateSetting(String key, int min, int max)
      A Model can request that its caller solicit input from a user; parses common date inputs; returns valid date in integer form YYYYMMDD; enforces min <= value <= max.
      double requestDoubleSetting(String key)
      A Model can request that its caller solicit input from a user.
      double requestDoubleSetting(String key, double min, double max)
      A Model can request that its caller solicit input from a user; enforces min <= value <= max.
      String requestFileName(String[] extensions)
      A Model can request that its caller solicit a valid file name from the local file system.
      String requestFileName(String title, String filename, int filterIndex, String[] filterNames, String filterPath, String[] extensions)
      A Model can request that its caller solicit a valid file name from the local file system.
      int requestIntSetting(String key)
      A Model can request that its caller solicit input from a user.
      int requestIntSetting(String key, int min, int max)
      A Model can request that its caller solicit input from a user; enforces min <= value <= max.
      String requestSetting(String key)
      A Model can request that its caller solicit input from a user.
      String requestSetting(String key, String dfltVal)
      A Model can request that its caller solicit input from a user.
      boolean requestYesOrNo(String msg)
      Request a response of 'yes' or 'no' from users (a response of 'yes' returns true; 'no' returns false).

      • requestDateSetting

        int requestDateSetting(String key,
                     int min,
                     int max)
                       throws ModelRunCanceledException,
                              ValidationException
        A Model can request that its caller solicit input from a user; parses common date inputs; returns valid date in integer form YYYYMMDD; enforces min <= value <= max.
        Parameters:
        key -
        min - lower bound for date input in form YYYYMMDD
        max - upper bound for date input in form YYYYMMDD
        Returns:
        Throws:
        ModelRunCanceledException
        ValidationException

      • requestYesOrNo

        boolean requestYesOrNo(String msg)
        Request a response of 'yes' or 'no' from users (a response of 'yes' returns true; 'no' returns false).

      • requestFileName

        String requestFileName(String title,
                     String filename,
                     int filterIndex,
                     String[] filterNames,
                     String filterPath,
                     String[] extensions)
                       throws ModelRunCanceledException
        A Model can request that its caller solicit a valid file name from the local file system.
        Parameters:
        title - Title to use for open file dialog. Can be null.
        filename - The initial filename which the dialog will select. Can be null.
        filterIndex - The 0-based index of the file extension filter which the dialog will use initially. Can be null.
        filterNames - The names that describe the filter extensions which the dialog will use to filter the files. Can be null.
        filterPath - The directory path that the dialog will use. Can be null.
        extensions - The file extensions which the dialog will use to filter the files. Can be null.
        Returns:
        Path to selected filename.
        Throws:
        ModelRunCanceledException

      • requestFileName

        String requestFileName(String[] extensions)
                       throws ModelRunCanceledException
        A Model can request that its caller solicit a valid file name from the local file system.
        Parameters:
        extensions -
        Returns:
        Path to selected filename.
        Throws:
        ModelRunCanceledException

      • connectToServer

        void connectToServer()
                     throws Exception
        Present user with server connection dialog.
        Throws:

      • connectToServer

        void connectToServer(com.metrics.common.servers.ManagedSolrServer server,
                   boolean editServer)
                     throws Exception
        Connect to a known server.
        Parameters:
        server - The server.
        editServer - If true and server is not null, allow user to edit the connection info.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • disconnectFromServers

        void disconnectFromServers(ArrayList<com.metrics.common.servers.ManagedSolrServer> servers,
                         boolean remove)
                           throws Exception
        Disconnect from servers.
        Parameters:
        servers - Servers to disconnect from.
        remove - Whether or not to also completely remove the servers from the system. If not removed, will be disabled.
        Throws:
        Exception
